Magmeld Emissary Leader Lada:
The Elves' Elemental Master discovered Magmeld long ago.
It is a place where both the Cat people and the beautiful Trees of Genesis are found.
But... you need to be careful - beautiful places can still be fraught with danger!
I hear that Magmeld has a dark secret, and really needs help. Would you like to go and find out what it is?
"Sure!"
"Can you tell me more first?"
